content.detailedDescription:
We have seen this object a number of times (5), since january on occasion.
mostly from a distance.  the appearance has been the same, tho in the past it was higher in the sky.  on the 2nd, it was observed much closer.  previous sightings were from a moving car.  on the 2nd, it appeared to be hovering approx. within 1 mile of our home...Near an hillside, and below the tree top levels.  during previous observations, the object did appear to wink out at one place and then wink back into view, at a considerable distance from it's former location.

during the time we observed, it appeared to hover, then move up or down.  the lights appeared to spin around the circumfrence of the object.  there was no sequence to the lights, just random.  it would, "wink", out and reappear.  also while the lights appeared to, "rotate", often all the colours of the lights mentioned above could sometimes be seen all at once.

it was cloudy and rainy that evening.  sighting lasted approx. 20 minutes.
towards the end of the sighting, we did try to take a picture of the object with a cell phone camera....Resulting photos were of very poor quality as they were taken thru a bedroom window.

have no idea on altitude, except it was well under treetop level.  there are homes on that hillside, but a daylight observation, using roof level on a carport as a guide, shows that there are no homes/buildings in that precise area.

when we attempted to take a 3rd photo of the object, it quickly winked out,
and we have not seen it since.

our cats and dogs both seemed mildly agitated.

i had a distinct impression that the object was, "flat bottomed", as i felt
i could see a line of demarcation at the bottom.

the object appeared to be, "surrounded", by the haze of the lights, which i
suppose could have been caused by rain in the area.

we had an earlier sighting of what we believe was likely this same object, but at a much closer distance.  we could observe much more detail on the object in that sighting, which occured along highway 5 near albany, oregon.
that craft had very oddly shaped, "windows", for lack of a better word.
if that observation requires a second report to be made, i will oblige.

during the observation, the cloud level was above the tops of the surrounding hills, and the object appeared to be perhaps 100 feet below the tree top level...Perhaps more.

sorry this is not more organized...I'm still rather puzzled that during all of our observations of this presumed same object, that no one else seemed to be taking notice of it.  most of the observations occured after at least 7:30 p.M., several as late as approx. 11:00 p.M.
content.summary: Round, diskoid, flat bottomed,  ascended/descended, below tree top level

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in a parking lot and noticed ahead of me a silver disc wobbling in the air coming down the street towards me.  it then disappeared behind a tree and i couldn't see it anymore.
content.summary: It was the classic silver disc in the air, it made a straight line up the street but was very wobbly and slow

content.detailedDescription:
Looked out of my all glass back door to veiw venus/jupiter conjunction when i noticed the bright objects darting about in the area of the planets. they were moving up and down, sideways and backwards. the flashing seemed to coinside with flying movements as they would disappear and the lights would come on in another location but never far from the planets. there is a possibility of more- but i saw 2 flashing at the same time and assume they were the same two repeatedly and were some distance from each other.

i look out often at the stars and it was all clear and bright at the time, no clouds to block the sight as what happens some nights.

i could not tell how close they were but brightness was similar to that of jupiter and almost as bright as venus.

i watched them in their spurt like movements for about 2-3 minutes, one had dissapeared, the other was still there when i returned to my living room. checked again 5-10 minutes later, neither one was present but a plane was approching from the s.W. and was also identified by flashing lights, it was too high to hear through closed doors- but moving much slower and going in a straight line towards the n.E. therefore verifying that the 2 objects i saw were definately not airplanes or anything i had ever seen before.

i have always believed in other life in space as it's vastness keeps expanding with stronger telescopes. i was excited and a little frightened but assumed they were some distance from here and would not be landing. would love to know if anyone else reported seeing the same objects...Thank you.

a. edwards
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Brightly glowing -red/orange in color flashing off and on

content.detailedDescription: During the evening of 2/21/08 there was a total luma eclipse. at 7:55 i went to the south facing bay window to check the progress of the eclipse, which had just started. out of the right side window of the bay i saw an extremely massive and very fast isososeles triangular craft coming towards me over steele hill from the east. i ran out as fast as i could to the ice covered walkway. at almost over head i locked in on the illuminated areas in the back corners ( see dia.) and then it went behind the pine trees. because of the size and speed i assumed it must be only a few thousand feet. puzzled, i came in and continued watghing tv. at 8:25 i once again checked on the eclipse, which was a little over half, and again a craft came over the hill with the same heading, but a bit to the right. as before i ran out and this time was able to pick on a nose strobe light and maybe, but not sure, one in the interior. just over head before loosing it again in the pines i noticed the the sound, which was that of a multi engine jet, lagged the craft by 2 or 3 body lenths. given this, i figured that it must be at least 20 to 30 thousand feet, making it very very much larger and faster than my earlier estimate. each occurance lasted no more than 5 or 6 seconds. there were no further sightings that night or since. i have often thought about it and it has always bothered me as to just what i had seen that night. i am sure that it must be american man made. i really hope that this somehow leads to answering my questions as to just what i saw that night-- and i am sure of that i saw.
content.summary: On the night of 2/21/08 during a total luna eclipse i saw an extremily large and very fast dark isosceles triangular craft coming from the east with illuminated areas in the back corners ( see dia.).

content.detailedDescription: It was the beginning of march, right when they were starting to do gas explorations in the minto flats in the nenana basin area and i was on my way home in the evening right before ten oclock pm. i had turned down my drive when i saw a  light down the drive by my neighbor's house who works away from home for weeks at at time. i decided to investigate and started down the drive when the white light dropped straight down in the sky, changing color  to red - so i turned my truck around in the neighbor's drive and was starting to get another witness, got to parks highway towing and decided it might be gone until i got back, so i better go and investigate on my own. as i started down the drive again, my house is 7/10 of a mile off parks highway, the light was still there and instead of it staying in one place, it started to come towards my truck again. this time i turned around in my drive and went back to parks highway and pulled into a turn off and watched the light for about ten minutes to see what it would do.When oit rose up it turned white again. it made no sound and was about the size of a helicopter. it stayed in one place, near my driveway. i decided that nobody would ever believe me so i went and got a friend of mine, and told him there was somthing funny going on at my house - would he have time to come with me and check it out. when we got back, the light was gone. i took him home, went home and haven't seen anything since. it was white, changed to red when it dropped down initially and then turned white again when it was higher in the sky. it made no noise, could stay in one place without making a sound, and dropped down in a straight line when it changed color.
content.summary: Whit light dropped down to above trees, turned white and camt towards my car

content.detailedDescription:
i spend most of my time looking at the sky, as i enjoy the endless perspective of the sky. in doing so, i have spotted quite a few 'interesting' lights in the sky, including multiple planes, blimps, helicopters, military and such. last week, around the 25th of march, some friends (4) and myself were standing in the yard watching the sky as a few planes had just left trails that seemed to turn into thin clouds... hazing the sky above us. we joked about why these trails were being layed in the sky at such an hour (about 8pm). i spot a very small, star-like light at a very high altitude, high enough that i couldnt begin to estimate a size. it was mostly white, although it pulsated from a red, to orange, to blue, and back to white again... in no particular pattern. it moved very quickly from vantage point to vantage point, and had the five of us in trance. once it was gone, we continued joking about the object's origin, later forgetting about it as the night progressed. 
     the next day, another friend of mine was leaving my house (which is located down a long, unlit, dirt road) and called me frantically, claiming that he was staring at a large, triangular object just above the tree line, off to his left. he claimed that it boasted three large white lights, one at each of the triangles edges, and one large, high intensity light in the center that looked to be more blue-ish (much like a xenon or hid bulb). he described this object to be hovering just above the trees, at a very slow rotation as to continue its hover. this went on, with me on the phone with him, for about five minutes or so, until he inturrupted me to tell me that it had stopped rotating and was now moving away from him, towards a near-by correctional institute. he managed to take a shakey video of the object, that proves nothing more than that an object was in fact very low to the treeline, but didnt show up clearly at all.  that was it...
     my property is surrounded by large, open fields, owned by that near-by correctional institute. it is extremely quiet here, and im used to the common air-crafts and birds and such. these recent sightings have been very curious to me, as i continue to hear strange sounds through my window at night, as if something is rummaging through my toolshed, although ive never seen anything more than strange lights... even at ground level. maybe these things are connected, maybe not. but for me, the question is why... why are these things occuring here... and what are they looking for, if anything?
content.summary: Multiple sightings over many nights... most recently in close range sighting. multiple witness

content.detailedDescription: On march 17,2012, i was taking pictures of the cloud patterns. a few days later when i uploaded them to my computer i noticed it in the photo.
content.summary: Showed up in the photo

content.detailedDescription: I was photographing the near conjunction of venus and the pleiades. i was using a nikon d7000 with a 18-105mm lens on a tripod. the exposures ranged from 3 to 15 sec at f11 with an iso of 6400. in the 62 seconds that the event was observed, i shot 6 exposures. i didn't notice anything by my eye or in the viewfinder but later, when i downloaded the pictures into adobe lightroom, i saw a blue nebulosity below and to the left of venus. in each subsequent photo, it moved up and to the right against the star field. i doubt it was a lens artifact as the camera didn't move and i took pictures of orion shortly thereafter with no problems. the sequence of photos were taken over 1 minute and 2 seconds from 2042:10 to 2043:12.  like i said i didn't see anything with the naked eye but the camera caught it at 6400 iso. i was using a remote cable release to trip the shutter and did not see any aircraft pass during that time period. when i saw the photos on the computer, i was mystified and excited. i've seen unknown objects before but this was the first time i've documented any, albeit unknowingly.
content.summary: Nebulous blue elongated oval apparent length 20 arc seconds

content.detailedDescription: After finishing work, i began my walk home along 100ave nw, and i noticed a pulsating orb above me, the same size as the red marker lights on the top of the surrounding buildings, at first i thought it was a helicopter, but without the faa lights activated.  i then noticed that the 'light' was moving overhead and also changing color from white to red and moving in a direction toward the south (over victoria golf and driving range). i took off my headphones and there was no sound being made by the orb, and the orb had now started to rise in elevation, approx 50 feet out into the ravine, in a spiral shape upwards and to the left, i stopped walking and watched as the orb peaked in altitude and after a short (1 ms) burst of light, was across the ravine and seemed to be behind the buildings over the far side of the valley (university of alberta). the orb was now the same size as the marker lights at the top of the buildings and seemed to moved behind the buildings for a short while, until seeming to dissappear.
content.summary: Pulsating orb (white/red)

content.detailedDescription: Approx 0140 mtn time in my hot tub, glendale az 85304: object in clear skies seen for approx five-seven seconds traveling at very high rate of speed from a southwest to north easterly direction. object appeared diamond shaped/ faint and speed was mostly consistent though in this time frame it appeared to have gained speed for the short time witnessed. being the faint and non streaking display it assumed and the fact that i have witnessed other ufo phenomena before i knew it was a good far distance in the atmosphere. i would have judged with time frame, arms apart distance, and previous ufo experience from michigan great lakes event to have been anywhere covering 200 miles to 500 miles in this short span. unlike previous witnessed phenomenons this event followed a straight line. glendale az, 85304 approx 0140 mtn standard
content.summary: Quick witness, no directional change, triangle shaped and seemed to have gained speed in 5-7 second time fame and fade in atmosphere

content.detailedDescription: There were three exact like bright blinking different colors lights that would orb into a larger and then become smaller the each were a god distance apart making a triangular shape around the the city, the one that was on the far left would make fast and slow  back and forth movements while the others would randomly stay still and suddenly move all three were blinking different bright colors and hover in same area
content.summary: Questionable and scary

content.detailedDescription:
Two pale red lights seen above west chester, pa at 9:58pm on april 2, 2012. i was standing in my backyard, smoking a cigarette (bad me), looking at the sky and saw the lights traveling in a slightly offset linear formation heading north-west. i immediately regarded them as something i have not witnessed in the past and pointed at them, saying to my wife standing next to me, "do you see that? what is that?" i pointed my fingers at the object(s) as they crossed the sky. our in-town home does not provide much vantage to the night sky, but i would say that i saw the lights pass for about 7 seconds until they were overcome by neighboring trees. my wife never did see what i was pointing at. the lights were steady, but pale, and i was not particularly surprised that she didn't see them-- but i was frustrated that she didn't. 

the pale red lights were silent as they passed overhead. a few minutes later some small planes flew by with all the telltale signs of being planes---red and green lights, strobes, noise.. 

i have no idea as to their distance in the sky, but the two lights were approximately an index and ring finger apart if spread in a v, just slightly offset.


i just read the 6 points at the side so..
1. home outside
2. looking at stars.. i just do that when i smoke.
3. something odd. i hadn't seen that before in the sky, so nothing came to mind, except to look. although, i first thought it was one object with a red light in front and in back; i never saw anything between the lights--and then because the lights were offset, i just assumed them to be two different separate items. either way, the lights maintained a steady distance, offset and speed from each other.
4. very steady, straight nw heading
5. just thought it was weird.
6. trees
content.summary: 2 pale red lights over west chester, pa. 4/02/2012, heading nw in linear offset formation.

content.detailedDescription: I had just laid down to sleep i thought when i woke up in a very dreary, fuzzy state of mind in my backyard looking towards the bayou behind my house. when i saw a huge, roughly the size of my house give or take, "ufo" slowly creep into my vision. upon looking at it i noticed it was disc shaped, kind of similar to the one drawn in the title bar of this website, only that it had a variation of red/orange/gold colored lights along where the top semi circle meets with the generic disc shape, all the way down to the base of the craft. once i noticed it, it "blinked" out of my sight and was followed by what i believe was a smaller version of itself, maybe a sister craft.
content.summary: Two ufos, one big one accompanied with might have been a smaller ufo

content.detailedDescription:
Playing tennis on a very clear sunday. no clouds super clear sky.
i followed a plane approaching lax and behind i noticed 3 bright dots circling behind the tail of the plane. i thought at first they were birds but realized too far up for birds plus the way they moved and circled each other. birds i say later did not have the same round shape.  they were real small but on such a clear sky i could see them. they disappeared...

i later looked up (10 min. later) and i saw a star in the sky. at first i said hey looks like venus but realized it could not be. i was looking northbound. as i looked west i saw another bright star in the sky. i realized there were two objects motionless in the sky. 

i brought  my daughter's attention to it and we looked at them for a few minutes. we could see balloons pass in the sky and see the difference. these bright objects did not move. after a 10 min. we looked again and the objects were gone.

and that is what i saw. there were objects in the california sky.
content.summary: Saw two groups, two stationary and three swirling around

content.detailedDescription: Driving along hwy 15 about 10pm just outside of plains georgia i noticed 3 diamond shaped objects pulsating in the se sky. i observed the lights about 15 min.I pulled over and took several photos of what appears to be round hard ball shape objects. i drove on searching for them and they had vanished! the pics will be available to view hopefully by tomorrow
content.summary: Diamond shapes 3 pulsating white green red and at times bright white also as a plane approached it went black as the plane passed the lights came back on

content.detailedDescription: Me and another person were standing outside of jefferson college in arnold, missouri. i pointed out the satellite that i see most nights from my backyard and mentioned how you can see a faint blinking of red and blue lights. to our right we noticed a very large yellowish/off-white lighted object. it was rectangular in shape only it didn't have sharp corners. it wasn't too high and it wasn't too far. it was a clear night and there was plenty of distance around it in every direction of empty sky. it was very slowly moving in a straight line. we looked at each other and tried to figure out if it could be a comet or meteor but we concluded that the object had no tail like a meteor would have. maybe 10-15 seconds went by, i looked back up and it was gone!!!! it was just gone. we freaked!!! the only reference i can give to explain the size and shape of it is the size of a cigarette butt if you are holding in in front of you--that big only in the freakin sky!!! it was amazing. i hope others seen it and perhaps got some footage cuz i would really love to see it. i don't know how long it was there before we noticed it. i have waited forever to see evidence for myself and this was real. i have always believed, but i just needed to see. thanks
content.summary: Low and unusually large off-white yellowish light slowly moving in clear sky, then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
Me and one other person were chatting outside jefferson college in 
arnold and i pointed to a satellite i usually see most nights from my backyard, then to the right we noticed a very unusually large off white/yellow light moving real slow in the clear open sky. it was night about 7:45 or so and there was plenty of open sky in all directions around this thing. it was shaped almost rectangular only it didn't have sharp corners. we looked back at each other and i said is that a meteor or comet or something but it had no tail like meteors and comets. boy if that would of been a meteor it would of for sure wiped out missouri!!! only 10-15 seconds probably went by and i looked back for it and it was gone!!!! the guy i was talking with was freakin and so was i. i finally seen it for myself, yes!!!!! i wonder who else got a glimpse of this? i wish i had some kind of video, cuz i cant even explain how big this light was and how close it was to us. hopefully whoever else comes forward will have some footage, cuz im not really sure about how long it had been there before we noticed it.  thanks
content.summary: Very unusually large light in clear sky then dissappeared

content.detailedDescription:
At 8:15pm i witnessed a triangle / chevron shaped craft approach me from a compass heading approximately 315 degrees nw above the tree line at our home.  the first indication was this very bright red light coming towards me; one would estimate its size to 1.5 times the size of the full moon. 
as it passed directly overhead, one could see it was a dimmed triangle outline with a very bright red luminous light with a little hit of orange underneath? this craft made no noise what���s so ever it was completely silent it���s heading before disappearing was approximately 147 degrees se. this craft must be between ��� and ��� mile high.
i rushed indoors to tell my wife what i just witnessed; my wife came out immediately and then she asked me what is this large red light coming towards us, i said that was the same direction of the one i saw, no blinking lights same type of craft, my wife started waving at it as it got directly overhead. my wife started waving at it and it started to slow down, then the red light suddenly got very bright, and moved on at steady pace flew over our house no sound and it just disappeared.
as it continued to get darker we decided watch longer, these are not the only sightings we have seen at this location.
we saw a star like object moving, erratically across the sky, would stop and change directions and then eventually stopping and staying stationary. three of the same type of objects would behave similarly one would occasionally glow red off and on whilst it was stationary. one came from compass heading 130 degrees se and crossed in front of the moon, departed with a heading of 25 degrees n.
note, my satellite finder showed no satellites in this area
content.summary: Witnessed two triangle / chevron fly over head

content.detailedDescription: Was on a balcony on 3rd floor of building and watching the sunset, when off in the distance i could make out what looked like a cloud moving the opposite direction that the wind was pushing the clouds.  above the horizon and the tree line, but i was 30 feet or more higher than the ground. it lasted about 7 minutes while the object moved slowly across the sky. to the northwest.
content.summary: Orange cylinder shape

content.detailedDescription: I went outside around 9:10pm est to lock my car and saw a row of orange colored lights on a structured object heading from north to south. this being the opposite direction of normal air traffic we see here. the object was low over the houses and was moving rather slowly. at first the object was not blinking any kind of lights just glowing a light orange hue. when i grabbed my camcorder out of my car and focused on the object and it was making little if any noise. i heard nothing at first which was strange as a cessna or any other airplane would be audible. the formation of lights is what is most peculiar about this footage as it doesnt look the standard conventional aircraft light formation. the object looks like a triangle upright and the flashes of purple/blue and one red light are very random. the red flash appears to be so far removed from the object itself and doesnt coincide with being on an airplane wingtip. i do not believe this to be of alien in origin, however not totally ruling out the possiblity.I do believe it is a military spy drone from wright patterson airforce base and we are under surveillance.
content.summary: Ufo or military spy drone april 2 2012 ohio

content.detailedDescription: I was walking along bayshore blvd. in tampa, fl on the night of march 27, 2012 at about 8:45 pm. i was looking at a tall building on the waterside when i first notices a bright amber light moving toward me, from northwest to southeast at an unknown altitude that was not much higher than the height of the building, maybe a bit more than 500 feet. the light made no sounds, had no other pulsating or strobe lights on it, and was moving at a relatively slow speed. it then disappeared from view in an instant, and after seeing this i knew that it was not any plane or other aircraft that i had seen before. i searched for it in the sky for a moment and then kept walking on. about a minute later, i was looking up in the direction that it had come from, trying to make sense of what i has seen, when i noticed an object moving along the same trajectory as the first, this time with no amber light. the object looked like a rectangular meteor, was dark grey, and was tumbling end-over-end. it made no noise and had a pulsating light on one side that i saw as it tumbled overhead. it was about at the same altitude as the first object, and was moving at the same speed. i tried to take video of it with my iphone, but it was too dark to pick up the object because of its color. the object continued to move slowly and i was able to observe it for about a minute as it went directly over my head and continued southeast over tampa bay and in the direction of macdill air force base. my girlfriend was walking with me and she also observed it and was unable to identify either object.
content.summary: Looked like a meteor that was almost "squared off" in the corners, had one pulsating light

content.detailedDescription: I was walking along bayshore blvd. in tampa, fl on the night of march 27, 2012 at about 8:45 pm. i was looking at a tall building on the waterside when i first notices a bright amber light moving toward me, from northwest to southeast at an unknown altitude that was not much higher than the height of the building, maybe a bit more than 500 feet. the light made no sounds, had no other pulsating or strobe lights on it, and was moving at a relatively slow speed. it then disappeared from view in an instant, and after seeing this i knew that it was not any plane or other aircraft that i had seen before. i searched for it in the sky for a moment and then kept walking on. about a minute later, i was looking up in the direction that it had come from, trying to make sense of what i has seen, when i noticed an object moving along the same trajectory as the first, this time with no amber light. the object looked like a rectangular meteor, was dark grey, and was tumbling end-over-end. it made no noise and had a pulsating light on one side that i saw as it tumbled overhead. it was about at the same altitude as the first object, and was moving at the same speed. i tried to take video of it with my iphone, but it was too dark to pick up the object because of its color. the object continued to move slowly and i was able to observe it for about a minute as it went directly over my head and continued southeast over tampa bay and in the direction of macdill air force base. my girlfriend was walking with me and she also observed it and was unable to identify either object.
content.summary: Looked like a meteor that was almost "squared off" in the corners, had one pulsating light

content.detailedDescription:
how do you know if you were dreaming or taken?  i'm almost afraid to ask.... do i want to know?  i feel it in my body but my mind wont let me think it's true.  here is what i felt.

just before i fell asleep, i heard a ringing in my left ear, it startled me into full awareness. i totally woke up, i don't know why.  it took me a while to fall back to sleep.  i think this is because i read that this happens sometimes when people are taken.... so, could it of been a dream?  my mind thinking about it?  after falling asleep, i felt like i woke up but couldn't move..  i forced my eyes open and standing in my bathroom, in my line of vision was---- a grey i think.  short, thin, large head, black almond eyes, large eyes and i could see another in my peripheral vision.  the one in the door of my bathroom, it almost seemed like he was in charge... he was still and silent, very small movements... a light sway here and there.  he was intense, but i had the feeling he was friendly.  he didn't scare me, but i felt he was the one that was controlling my not being able to move.  i have the feeling he was the one that made me feel calm and after i panicked and became afraid, i think he is the one that gave me the feeling of euphoria.  he was in the shadows but i remember him clearly.  i was surprised that he was so short, maybe slightly taller than my door-nob i think. as i was laying down, i didn't have to look up to see him clearly.

 i quickly closed my eyes and told myself i was dreaming.  i don't know how long i stayed like that, it felt like only a minute.  it was like i could hear them thinking.  the second one, he moved quickly.  he is the one that frightened me, he is the one that has the sing-song voice. i thought he was singing in my mind,  i don't know what he was looking for but i do know he was going through my stuff... i only remember one thing of what he said, but i don't know what he ment by it, i remember hearing the words or impression of "bad baby". and that disturbed me.  last september, i went through a 4 or 5 day period of time... i knew i was pregnant.... i knew it.  when i was laying down and i rolled over, i felt the sharp painful pull of the muscle holding my uterus.... sounds funny, but i only had that when i was pregnant and the weight of the baby made the muscle pull, it started in my pregnancies at about the 5th or 6th week and always got worse the bigger the baby grew.  i also had a heaviness or a fullness in my uterus. i kept talking myself out of it, i finally got around to taking a test and it came up negative, but i could of sworn i was pregnant.  after talking with a friend and putting a few time lines together, i think they impregnated me. my friend said it usually only last 3 - 5 days.  i was happy i wasn't crazy and sad because i don't know if i will ever meet my child, is it my child?  i carried him, so i feel like it's my child, even if it was only for a couple of days.  anyways back to last night. when he said "bad baby" it upset me because i thought that maybe something was wrong with my baby. at this point,  i still feel like i cant move.  

i didn't want to see them so i closed my eyes.  that's when i got the weirdest sensation, i was floating, rotating around above my bed.  i was scared this whole time and yet not scared or maybe just this feeling of calm, this deep, deep sense of calm. as i was floating--- how do i explain this--- you know what the pressure you feel when your lying down, that softness of your bed when your really, really tired and it feels so soft and comforting and solid? that's how i felt all around my body.  this soft wonderful pressure surrounding me and it was nice.  i felt no breeze as i floated but i could feel the sensation of turning.

then i was back in my bed, i was more aware again and thinking of "bad baby" and then i heard a moan and thought it was one of my girls. i felt an intense protectiveness and became upset. i wanted to protect her but i couldn't move.
 i felt an intense fear came over me.  i told them no--- or thought the words, it was like i could hear them with no noise.  i felt panicked, then suddenly i got this rush of euphoria.  i was covered in it. i could feel it everywhere in my body, i tingled with it, i could feel myself smiling, even laughing in my head.  it was wonderful. then it was like the "heaviness" that surrounded me left, but i felt so good i didn't want to move or it would go away. 

my body felt heavy but my mind told me to move, so i started with my hands and as i wiggled my fingers i felt the euphoria leaving my body, going up towards my face, which still tingled.  when i stood up i felt unsteady and a heaviness in my limbs, but i still went to check the girls.  they were all sleeping.

i tried to go back to bed, but i felt surreal and when i just lay there i started to cry.  i don't know what to feel, i don't know what to think, i don't know if it was a dream or if it was real.  so i decided to write it all down on my computer, but when i turned on my computer, it made a series of low tone, loud buzzing noises, twice in a row.  i've never heard it before.  

i'm really tired now so i think i'm going to go back to bed. i don't know if i like this. i feel a little fear to go back to sleep and that's stupid, if it wasn't a dream... they wouldn't come back again... and yet at the same time i don't feel fear... i think because i believe that no matter what, i am god's child and he is watching over me and because he is god, they were created by him too....  weird.  i do know that i have that image etched into my mind...  of him standing in my bathroom doorway just looking at me... dream or real... i wont forget that.
content.summary: Visitation

content.detailedDescription:
I was about to get into my car to go to work. it was early in the morning when i saw what at first i assumed were a flock of birds but there was something that impressed me as possibly not being right so i took a photo and quit frankly forgot about it until sometime later when i was reviewing my digital photos and came upon the photo attached (the second photo attached is an enlargement of the first). what became immediately apparent about these objects is that they do not appear to have heads, tails, or for that matter, wings and look to be solid retangular objects although the corners may be rounded. the were flying in a v formation from right to left. please feel free to contact me at my email address if you would like.
tim
content.summary: Ten retactangular craft flying in a v formation from right to left. not sure of altitude

content.detailedDescription:
On this morning at 0556 i was sitting in my truck looking west and caught a very white bright orb/ufo in the north at daybreak at 1:00. it was heading south slowly just wobbling and flying above the ocean inland (very low) taking its time. as i got out of my truck and started to video and speak the orb winked out. this orb/ufo was very silent, and all you could hear was the small waves hitting the shoreline. at this point i got back in my truck in hopes it would return. it reappeared at 0600 at about 12:00 low once again to the ocean. due south appeared to be its course, and there was a tinge of yellow with white now. once again, i got out of my truck and proceeded to get videos and pictures with my nikon digital camera. this time the orb/ufo stuck around for few minutes and would just hover in one spot as i watched it and snapped more pictures. this object remained silent. 

within a few minutes out of nowhere, and i am in the middle of no where a large sounding vehicle was coming down the road from the south east. i am 28 miles from town out in the national forest and a large vehicle, which when it turned to come down the hill and intrude upon my ufo sighting moment was actually a tow truck! yeah, if you can believe that. i was thinking to myself, what in the frick is that doing out here at this time of the morning and out of all the pull offs, this one. there were two men, they both got out not only looking at me, but then looked at the beach and rocks below. i continued my sighting adventure. my ufo started to flash red, white, orange and yellow and start to accelerate and ascend to the south silently. this i had seen many times before with similar objects. as i looked through my binoculars once again i could not identify it and it resembled the others i had seen in prior sightings. it was flat with alot of bright white lights, and red flashing on the bottom, with some orange..Tints of yellow. it like the others, headed towards the small mountain ridge to the south east and then disappeared. just like that it was gone. upon my departure, the two men with the tow truck started to pull some "dummie's" truck up off the beach and rocks below the parking area. as i headed home  exhaustion and fatigue would over come me, so i ended up sleeping most of the morning until 1146 . which, sleeping in is not a very common occurance for me.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: On this morning at 0556 i was sitting in my truck and caught a very bright white orb heading south flying low over the ocean. orb/ufo was close and would wobble and then hover. it winked out one time then reappeared to continue its southern course. .

content.detailedDescription: Flying in v-formation 9 diamond shaped bronze colored craft then stoped and went into a circular formation and darted off in seperate directions. me and my cousin both witness this event.
content.summary: Diamond bronze shape. 9 objects

content.detailedDescription:
My fiance and i were enjoying the sunset on his patio overlooking the hills.  we noticed a small, oval or blimp-shaped "thing" traveling over the top of the hill in a north-west direction.  we ruled out it being an actual blimp because of its rather speedy movement and the fact that it was going against a brisk wind.  i watched it for about a minute or so till it disappeared into the clouds and setting sun.  it seemed to be climbing at a small angle, and it may have wobbled a little on its pretty much steady path and/or hovered a bit.  it was so tiny to my vision that even with my glasses on i couldn't be sure.

we watch the skies in all weather and are familiar with the birds and planes we frequently see.  this "thing" didn't seem all that extraordinary, but it was an anomaly, so i'm reporting it in case it is of some value to your organization.
content.summary: Dark gray to black oval or blimp-shaped, traveling against the wind
